description: Create comprehensive integration tests for workflow executor using existing YAML workflows

features: Test: Parallel execution (verify timing, all 3 scans run concurrently)
Test: Dependency resolution (steps execute in correct order)
Test: Output resolution ({{ }} templates work correctly)
Test: Conditional steps (skip when condition false)
Test: Retry logic (step retries on failure)
Test: Resume after failure (continues from last completed step)
Test: on_failure handlers (executed when workflow fails)
Test: State persistence (state survives script restart)
Test: Concurrent workflows (multiple workflows run simultaneously)
Test: Trigger types (manual, schedule, webhook, event)

acceptance_criteria: All existing YAML workflows execute successfully
Clear test output with pass/fail indicators
